channel.title: More Factory Build items
channel.description:
Hi All, Dose anyone know if there is a mods or someone is working on a mod for more foundations, fences and walls? I have almost finished my world for now and have areas in need of such things as 45-degree angle fences, more sizes for slopped walls and angled foundation that smoothly finish rather than just stopping. I have skills to create one but thought Id check first.
Thx

item.title: More Factory Build items
item.dc:creator: @Robb Rob B
item.description:
@Robb wrote:

From a quick search on the mod portal, it looks like Ramped Fences and Sloped Walls exist. Youâ€™d have to look around some more to see if there are similar ones for foundations.

Read full topic
